::KitKat::

She kissed Drillbit and looked at him.  As much as she wanted him to 
stay with her, she knew he was needed at the ark. "Love, I need you 
to go with the others to help rebuild the Ark.  Your the best driller 
and tunneler around. Surely they will need your strength and skill in 
the rebuilding." She kissed him again and then turned, opened the 
door to her room, and motioned for him to go. "HUrry up and get 
there, get that ship build and hurry back to me."  she the let an 
evil grin creep across her face. "I"ll have a home coming suprize 
waiting for you when you get back."  She smiled at him.



DarkMouse::
She transformed into mouse mode and scurried along, trying to keep 
Destructor in her sight.  She had no clue why she was even going to 
the ark.  She was a pred, they were maximals, sworn enemies. Why help 
them?  Why not attack and kill them while they were down? She coudn't 
understand.  But, this was her last chance to be with a group, and 
she needed the protection of a group as long as Megatron was around.  
She followed and would arrive to the ark soon enough. Then she would 
talk to Destructor about having his logic circuits checked.





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  The horsemen transformed to robot mode. Turned to see that their 
leader had 
> not yet arrived. They pondered why Kit Kat would send so little 
forces. 
> Megatron would not dare to attack now. Unless they where completely 
insane. 
> And their still was the missing death. What happened to him?
> 
> Destructor:: It seemed as if Kit Kat would not allow Drill Bit to 
go. So he 
> looked to dark mouse..."Let us be off. The more time we waste here 
the more 
> chances of our destruction grows." He tried not to show it but when 
Kit kat 
> walked off he was very dissapointed in her. She let her emotions 
cloud her 
> judgment. He turned and flew out of the base not looking back. He 
was hopeful 
> that dark mouse would follow with out a problem. If not then she 
would only 
> get in the way anyway.
